line_1: Have made the Bard, of their own vile accord,
line_2: Inferior to that thing we call a Lord.

line_1: And the whole People cried, with one accord,
line_2: Good Heaven bless us all, is That a Lord!

line_1: They grieve indeed, but join with one accord
line_2: To share the fortunes of an happier lord.
Feels thy dread pow'r another heart afford,

line_1: Ev'n they to whom kind Nature did accord
line_2: Through the foul brothel and the wine-stain'd board
